product_name: The North Face Denali Fleece Jacket - Toddler Boys'
long_description: The North Face Denali jacket for toddlers snuggles your little guy in warm, water-repellent polyester fleece and handsome style while he plays outside. Exceptionally warm, recycled heavyweight Polartec(R) 300 Series fleece is treated with a Durable Water Repellent finish to shed water. Abrasion-resistant nylon overlays on upper body and reinforced stitching in high-stress areas increase durability. The North Face Denali jacket features zippered handwarmer pockets, non-binding nylon/Lycra(R) spandex cuffs and an elastic-bound hem. Full-length front zipper extends high for neck protection; write-on ID label helps prevent loss.
short_description: The North Face Denali jacket for toddlers snuggles your little guy in warm, water-repellent polyester fleece and handsome style while he plays outside.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Infants And Toddlers
product_group: Infants And Toddlers Fleece Jackets And Pants
